news.title: Tourist victim of ‘one-strike’ attack in Temple Bar undergoes emergency surgery
news.summary: An English tourist has been hospitalised with serious head injuries after being attacked in the Temple Bar area of Dublin City centre overnight.

news.title: Garda suspended after death of man in Dublin
news.summary: A garda under investigation in relation to the death of a man in Dublin city centre has been suspended from duty.

news.title: Israel bombards Gaza City ahead of planned invasion as international condemnation of West Bank plan grows
news.summary: The Israeli military maintained its pressure on Gaza City with heavy bombardments overnight, residents said, ahead of a Thursday meeting between Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and his ministers on plans to seize the enclave's largest city.

news.title: Taoiseach Micheál Martin to bow to pressure on fielding Fianna Fáil presidential candidate
news.summary: Taoiseach Micheál Martin could have a Fianna Fáil presidential candidate on the pitch in the next 10 days, as pressure builds within his party to outline his plans.

news.title: Are grandparents right – are we taking the mick when it comes to asking them to mind our kids?
news.summary: On my way to a night out in Dublin recently, an older couple stepped on to the Dart with an empty buggy. “That was a long day,” I heard the woman say as she sank down into a seat. “It’s just so physically demanding when they’re that age,”

news.title: Roy Keane reveals he would like to work alongside Damien Duff if he returns to management
news.summary: Roy Keane has revealed he would like to work with Damien Duff if he makes a return to management.

news.title: 10 mistakes people make looking for love – and how to date better, according to a matchmaker
news.summary: Feargal Harrington has spent the past 15 years successfully matching couples across the country as the director and co-founder of Dublin-based matchmaking service Intro. Below, he shares the mistakes he often sees people making in the search for a potential partner, and his advice for finding true love.

news.title: ‘My sister was a little corner of heaven and Mam was an amazing woman’ – singer Honor Heffernan in safety plea after carbon monoxide double tragedy
news.summary: Jazz singer and actor Honor Heffernan has urged people to be aware of so-called silent killers in their homes after statistics showed chimneys, flues, hot ashes and soot were the top causes of fires last year.

news.title: ‘There was no rush, no traffic lights, no beeping of horns’ – see two Irish beauty spots at once in new cruise experience
news.summary: When the opportunity arose to spend 24 hours in the Lakeland County, I jumped at the chance.

news.title: This Working Life: ‘I didn’t get the points to do medicine the first time – but then Hpats arrived’
news.summary: ?Four years ago, myself and another GP, Fergal McNamara, were discussing how haemorrhoids were a common concern – and yet were something patients were reluctant to bring up.
